Class Deck

java.lang.Object
Card
Deck
public class Deck extends Card
The Deck class holds the cards used in the game and holds methods that relate to the deck.
Author:
Rachel Hussmann

    Default constructor

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Energy
    findFirstEnergy()
    The findFirstEnergy method finds the first energy card in the deck.
    Pokemon
    findFirstPokemon()
    The findFirstPokemon method finds the first pokemon card in the deck.
    void
    generateDeck()
    The generateDeck method generates a standard deck of cards with 20 pokemon, 20 trainer cards, and 20 energy cards.
    void
    generateDeckMulligan(int numOfPokemon, int numOfEnergies)
    The generateDeckMulligan method creates a deck of 60 cards with the specified number of pokemon and energies for the MulliganMonteCarlo class and simulation.

    generateDeckRareCandy(int numOfPokemon, int numOfEnergies, int numOfTrainers)
    The generateDeckRareCandy method creates a new deck of 60 cards for use in the BrickMonteCarlo class and simulation.

  • Constructor Details

    • Deck

      public Deck()
      Default constructor

  • Method Details

    • generateDeck

      public void generateDeck()
      The generateDeck method generates a standard deck of cards with 20 pokemon, 20 trainer cards, and 20 energy cards.

    • generateDeckMulligan

      public void generateDeckMulligan(int numOfPokemon, int numOfEnergies)
      The generateDeckMulligan method creates a deck of 60 cards with the specified number of pokemon and energies for the MulliganMonteCarlo class and simulation.
      Parameters:
      numOfPokemon - The number of pokemon to be added to the deck.
      numOfEnergies - The number of energies to be added to the deck.

    • generateDeckRareCandy

      public void generateDeckRareCandy(int numOfPokemon, int numOfEnergies, int numOfTrainers)
      The generateDeckRareCandy method creates a new deck of 60 cards for use in the BrickMonteCarlo class and simulation.
      Parameters:
      numOfPokemon - The number of pokemon to be generated.
      numOfEnergies - The number of energies to be generated.
      numOfTrainers - The number of trainer cards to be generated.

    • shuffle

      public void shuffle()
      The shuffle method shuffles the current deckOfCards

    • pickTopCard

      public Card pickTopCard()
      The pickTopCard method returns the card that is on the top of the deck.
      Returns:
      The Card object from the top of the deck.

    • getDeckOfCards

      public ArrayList<Card> getDeckOfCards()
      getDeckOfCards is the getter method for the deckOfCards variable.
      Returns:
      The deckOfCards variable (An ArrayList of card objects).

    • setDeckOfCards

      public void setDeckOfCards(ArrayList<Card> deckOfCards)
      setDeckOfCards is the setter method for the deckOfCards variable.
      Parameters:
      deckOfCards - The new deck.

    • returnHandToDeck

      public void returnHandToDeck(ArrayList<Card> hand)
      The returnHandToDeck method returns a hand of cards back to the deck.
      Parameters:
      hand - The hand of Cards that the player needs to return to the deck

    • findFirstPokemon

      public Pokemon findFirstPokemon()
      The findFirstPokemon method finds the first pokemon card in the deck.
      Returns:
      The first Pokemon cards found in the deck.

    • findFirstEnergy

      public Energy findFirstEnergy()
      The findFirstEnergy method finds the first energy card in the deck.
      Returns:
      The first Energy card found in the deck.
